AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Return 'success' if there are adequate resources for creating the data structures for the data items

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Create the data structures required for the data items and return 'success' if creation was successful

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Return 'success' if current values of data items can be initialized with their default values in zero logical execution time or else return 'success' if initialization of current value of data items has completed

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Start initialization of current values of data items with their default values and return 'success' if the initialization has completed

AP: Shutdown Action of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component

AP: Execution Procedure of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component

AP: Definition of Data Items in the Data Pool Component
DefValue: No default defined at framework level

AP: Operation to access the Current Value of a Data Item
DefValue: No default defined at framework level

AP: Operation to update the Current Value of a Data Item
DefValue: No default defined at framework level

AP: Operation to Report Packet Destination Invalid
DefValue: Run the Packet Re-Routing Failure Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Acceptance Failure
DefValue: Run the Packet Acceptance Failure Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Acceptance Success
DefValue: Run the Command Verification Success Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Start Failed for InCommand
DefValue: Run the Command Verification Failure Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Start Successful for InCommand
DefValue: Run the Command Verification Success Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Progress Failed for InCommand
DefValue: Run the Command Progress Failure Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Progress Successful for InCommand
DefValue: Determine if a progress step has been completed and, if so, run the Command Progress Success Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Termination Failed for InCommand
DefValue: Run the Command Verification Failure Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Report Termination Successful for InCommand
DefValue: Run the Command Verification Success Procedure

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of OutComponent
DefValue: Same value as in OutComponent

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of OutComponent
DefValue: Same value as in OutComponent

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of OutComponent
DefValue: Same value as in OutComponent

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of OutComponent
DefValue: Same value as in OutComponent

AP: Shutdown Action in Base Component of OutComponent
DefValue: Same value as in OutComponent

AP: Service Type Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: Service type is set to 1

AP: Command/Report Sub-Type Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: Report sub-type is in accordance with the type of verification report (1 to 8 or 10)

AP: Destination Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: No default provided at framework level

AP: Acknowledge Level Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: All service 1 OutComponents are reports and therefore carry no acknowledge flags

AP: Discriminant Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: No discriminant attribute is defined for service 1 reports

AP: Parameter Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: Parameter values are as defined by the service 1 procedures called in adaptation points S1-1 to S1-9

AP: Enable Check Operation of OutComponent
DefValue: Service 1 reports are always enabled

AP: Ready Check Operation of OutComponent
DefValue: Service 1 reports are always ready

AP: Repeat Check Operation of OutComponent
DefValue: Service 1 reports are never repeated

AP: Update Action of OutComponent
DefValue: No action

AP: Serialize Operation of OutComponent
DefValue: No default defined at framework level

AP: Operation to Report Invalid Destination of an OutComponent
DefValue: Generate SNDPCKT\_INV\_DEST Error Report
